trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <see langword="EmphasisBreak" /> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores para tamanhos de <see langword="EmphasisBreak" /> entre palavras faladas.

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A ênfase de interrupção está definida para <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instâncias por meio de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade em uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Cada mecanismo de fala sintético é livre para determinar como renderizar quebras entre as palavras; a natureza da ênfase difere entre idiomas, dialetos, gêneros ou vozes.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> pode ser usado ao definir ou obter o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> em um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instância.

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores podem ser diferenciados pelo fato de que os valores reais do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> são todos menor que zero e os valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> são maiores ou iguais a zero; e usando o valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propriedade em uma instância.
